A vvay unto true Christian unitie the worship of God in spirit and in truth : together vvith many spirituall benefits therein received now in this life and everlastingly ... Reeve, Edmund, d. 1660.
[8], 47 p.
Printed by John Legatt and are to be sold by Edward Wright ..., London : 1648.
Attributed to Edmund Reeve. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Marginal notes.
